title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Last year, Democrats flipped 40 Republican seats in the House, and not one of those 40 Democrats support the policies of our front runners at center stage. Now, I share their progressive values, but I'm a little more pragmatic. I was out of work for two whole years until I started what became the largest brewpub in America. And I learned the small best--the small business lessons of how to provide service and teamwork and became a top mayor, and as governor of Colorado, created the number one economy in the country.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: We also expanded healthcare and reproductive rights. We attacked climate change head on. We beat the NRA. We did not build massive government expansions. Now, some will promise a bill tonight or a plan for tonight, but we focused on was making sure that we got people together to get things done, to--to provide solutions to problems, to make sure that we--that we worked together and created jobs. That's how we're going to be Donald Trump, that's how we are going to win Michigan in the country.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: Let's get real. Tonight, we debate, but ultimately, we have to beat Donald Trump. My background, it's a little bit different than his. I stand before you today as a granddaughter of an iron ore miner, as a daughter of a union teacher and a newspaperman, as the first woman elected to the U.S. Senate from the state of Minnesota and a candidate for president of the United States. That's because we come from a country of shared dreams and I have had it with the racist attacks. I have had it with the president says one thing on TV that has your back and then you get home and you see those charges for prescription drugs and cable and college.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: You're going to hear a lot of promises up here, but I'm going to tell you this. Yes, I have bold ideas, but they are grounded in reality. And yes, I will make some simple promises. I can win this. I'm from the Midwest and I have won every race, every place, every time, and I will govern with integrity, the integrity worthy of the extraordinary people of this nation.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: I'm running for president because I believe that America discovers its greatness and its moments of greatest need. This moment will define us forever and I believe that in this test, America will be redeemed. In the face of cruelty and fear from a lawless president, we will choose to be the nation that stands up for the human rights of everyone, for the rule of law for everyone, and democracy that serves everyone. Whatever our differences, we know that before we are anything else, we are Americans first and we will ensure that each one of us is well enough and educated enough and paid enough to realize our full potential.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: We will meet these challenges here at home and we will lead the world in those that we face abroad, successfully confronting endless war and climate change. At this moment of truth, let us pursue our national promise and make a more perfect union of everyone, by everyone, and for everyone.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: I'm running for president because our country is running out of time. It is even bigger than the emergency of the Trump presidency. Ask yourself how somebody like Donald Trump ever gets within cheating distance of the oval office in the first place. It doesn't happen unless America is already in a crisis, an economy that not working for everyone, endless war, climate change. We have lived this. In my industrial Midwestern hometown, my generation has lived this as long as we have been alive, and it's only accelerating.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Science tells us we have 12 years before we reach the horizon of catastrophe when it comes to our climate. By 2030, the average house in this country will cost $.5 million and a woman's right to choose may not even exist. We are not going to be able to meet this moment by recycling the same arguments number policies, and politicians that have dominated Washington for as long as I have been alive. We've got to summon the courage to walk away from the past and do something different. This is our shot.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: That is why I am running for president.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Donald Trump disgraces the office of presidents every single day and anyone on this stage tonight or tomorrow night would be a far better president. I promise no matter who our candidate is I will work my heart out to beat Donald Trump and to elect a Democratic Congress.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: But our problems didn't start with Donald Trump. Donald Trump is part of a corrupt rigged system that has helped the wealthy and the well-connected and kicked dirt in the faces of everyone else. We are not going to solve the urgent problems that we face with small ideas and spinelessness.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We are going to solve them by being the Democratic Party of big structural change. We need to be the party that fights for our democracy and our economy to work for everyone. I know what's broken in this country, I know how to fix it and I will fight to make it happen.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Tonight in America as we speak 87 million Americans are uninsured or underinsured but the healthcare industry made $100 billion in profits last year. Tonight as we speak right now 500,000 Americans are sleeping out on the street and yet companies like Amazon that made billions in profits did not pay one nickel in federal income tax. Tonight half of the American people are living paycheck to paycheck and yet 49 percent of all new income goes to the top 1 percent. Tonight the fossil fuel industry continues to receive hundreds of billions of dollars in subsidies and tax breaks while they destroyed this planet. We have got to take on trumps racism, his sexism, xenophobia and come together in an unprecedented--unprecedented grassroots movement to not only defeat Trump but to transform our economy and our government.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: You are wrong.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Right now we have a dysfunctional health care system, 87 million uninsured or underinsured, 500,000--500,000 Americans every year are going bankrupt because of medical bills, 30,000 people dying while the healthcare industry makes tens of billions of dollars in profit. Five minutes away from here, John, is a country called Canada. They guarantee health care to every man, woman and child as a human right. They spend half of what we spend and by the way when you end up in a hospital in Canada you come out with no bill at all. Healthcare is a human right, not a privilege. I believe that. I will fight for that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: My name was also mentioned in this.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: The fact of the matter is tens of millions of people lose their health insurance every single year when they change jobs or their employer changes that insurance. If you want stability in the healthcare system, if you want a system which gives you freedom of choice with regard to doctor or hospital which is a system which will not bankrupt you the answer is to get rid of the profiteering of the drug companies and the insurance companies--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --(INAUDIBLE) Medicare.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: No. No one is the party--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Okay.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: So, look--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Let's--let's be clear about this. We are the democrats. We are not about trying to take away healthcare from anyone. That's what the republicans are trying to do.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: And we should stop using republican talking points in order to talk with each other about how to best provide that healthcare.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Now, I want to have a chance to tell the story about my friend, Eddie Barkin (PH). Eddie is 35 years old. He has a wife, Rachel (PH). He has a cute little boy named Carl. He also has ALS and it's killing him. Eddie has health insurance. Good health insurance.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: And it's not--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Nearly enough.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --No, this is important.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: All right.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Giant corporations and billionaires are going to pay more. Middle class families are going to pay less out of pocket for their healthcare. And I'd like to finish talking about Eddie, the guy who has ALS.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: This isn't funny. This is somebody who has health insurance and is dying. And every month, he has about $9,000 in medical gill--bills that his insurance company won't cover. His wife, Rachel, is on the phone for hours and hours and hours begging the insurance company, please cover what the doctors say he needs. He talks about what it's like to go online with thousands of other people to beg friends, family, and strangers for money so he can cover his medical expenses. The basic profit model of an insurance company is taking as much as money as you can in premiums and pay out as little as possible in healthcare coverage. That is not working for--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Americans across this country.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Medicare for All will fix that and that's why I'll--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Fight for it.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Costs will go up for billionaires and go up for corporations. For middle class families, costs--total costs will go down.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Let me--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --But, I--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --Hey--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: So, we don't have to stand up here speculating about whether the public option will be better than--or a Medicare for All environment will be better than the corporate options. We can put it to the test. That's the concept of my Medicare for All Who Want It proposal. That way, if people like me are right, that the public alternative is going to be not only more comprehensive, but more affordable than any other corporate options around there, we'll see Americans walk away from the corporate options into that Medicare option and it will become Medicare for All--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --Without us having to kick--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --We have (INAUDIBLE)--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --Anybody off.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: I think you can buy into it. That's the idea of Medicare for All Who Want It. Look, this is a distinction without a difference, whether you're paying the same money in the form of taxes or premiums. Look, in this country, if you have health coverage--if you don't have health coverage, you're paying too much for care. And if you do have health coverage, you're paying--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --Too much for care.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: The answer is no, the middle class will not pay more in taxes in order to ensure that every American is guaranteed world class healthcare. I think we're being offered in a false choice.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: Some who want to improve the affordable care act at the margins. Others who want a Medicare for all program that will force people off of private insurance. I have a better path--Medicare for America. Everyone who is uninsured is enrolled in Medicare tomorrow. Those who are insufficiently insured are enrolled in Medicare.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: Those who have (INAUDIBLE).

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: You have some, Governor Bullock, who said that we will improve the affordable care act at the margins with a public option. You have others to my right who are talking about taking away people's choice for the private insurance that they have or members of unions. I was listening today--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: His--his (INAUDIBLE) they are offering a false choice.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: Every--every estimate that I've seen of expanding ACA even through a public option still leaves millions of people uninsured and also means that people are not guaranteed the healthcare that they need as the example that Senator Warren showed us. Our plan ensures that everyone is enrolled in Medicare or can keep their employer sponsored insurance. When we listen to the American people and this is what they want us to do--they want everyone covered but they want to be able to maintain choice and our plan does that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: That is incorrect. I just have a better way to do this. And in one of my first debates, Jake, I was called a street fighter from the iron range by my opponent. And when she said it I said, thank you. So, this is what I think we need to get done. We need the public option. That's what Barack Obama wanted and it would bring healthcare costs down for everyone. And by the way, I just don't buy this. I've heard some of these candidates say that it somehow not moral if you -- not moral to not have that public option. Well Senator Sanders was actually on a public option bill last year and that was Bernie the Medicaid public option bill that Senator Schatz introduced. Clearly, this is the easiest way to move forward quickly and I want to get things done. People can't wait. I've got my friend Nicole out there whose son was actually died trying to ration his insulin as a restaurant manager and he died because he didn't have enough money to pay for it. And Bernie and I have worked on pharmaceutical (INAUDIBLE) together--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: We can get health expenses (INAUDIBLE).

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: As the author of the Medicare bill let me clear up one thing--as people talk about having insurance there are millions of people who have insurance they can't go to the doctor and when they come out of the hospital they go bankrupt, all right?

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: What I am talking about and others up here are talking about is no deductibles and no copayments. And Jake, your question is a republican talking point. At the end of the day and by the way--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: And by the way, by the way the healthcare industry will be advertising tonight on this program.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Oh, can I complete that please?

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: They are advertising tonight with that talking point.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We need to think of this in terms of the big frame. What's the problem in Washington? It works great for the wealthy. It works great for those who can hire armies of lobbyists and lawyers. And it keeps working great for the insurance companies and the drug companies. What it's going to take is real courage to fight back against them. These insurance companies do not have a god given right to make $23 billion in profits and suck it out of our healthcare system.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: They do not have a god given right--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --(INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: It's not a business.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Well obviously, I disagree with that, as much as I respect both of the senators to my right. You know, I think it comes down to that question of Americans being used to being able to make choices, to have the right to make a decision. And I think proposing a public option that allows some form of Medicare but maybe as accommodation of--of Medicare Advantage and Medicare, but people choose it and if enough people choose it, it--it expands, the quality improves, the cost comes down, or people choose it. Eventually, in 15 years, you could get there, but it would be an evolution, not a revolution.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: You know--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --We have tried this experiment with the insurance companies and what they've done is they've sucked billions of dollars out of our healthcare system and they force people to have to fight to try to get the healthcare coverage that their doctors and nurses say that they need. Why does everybody--why does every doctor, why does every hospital have to fill out so many collocated forms? It's because it gives insurance companies a chance to say no and to push that cost back on the patients.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: That's what we have to fight.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: It is time to stop worrying about what the Republicans will say. Look, if--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --If--it's true that if we embrace a far-left agenda, they are going to say we are a bunch of crazy socialists. If we embrace a conservative agenda, you know what we are--they're going to do? They're going to say we are a bunch of crazy socialist. So let's just stand up for the right policy--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Go out there and defend it. That's a policy I'm putting forward, not because I think is the right triangulation between Republicans here and to progress there, because I think it's the right answer for people like my mother-in-law who is here whose life was saved by the ACA but who is still far too vulnerable to the fact of the insurance industry--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --Does not care about her.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Jake.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Let's be clear what this debate is about. Nobody can defend the dysfunctionality of the current system. What we are taking at--on is the fact that over the last 20 years the drug companies and the insurance companies have spent $4.5 billion dollars of your health insurance money on lobbying and campaign contributions. That is why when I went to Canada the other day people paid a 10th the price in Canada for insulin--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --That they are paying in the United States.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Well, two things. They will be better because Medicare for all is comprehensive and covers all health care needs for senior citizens. It will finally include dental care, hearing aids, and eyeglasses.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --Second of all--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --Second of all--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --I do know, and I wrote the damn bill.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: And second of all--second of all, many of our union brothers and sisters, nobody more pro-union than me up here, are now paying high deductibles in copayments. And when we do Medicare for All, instead of having the company putting money on-

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: healthcare they can get decent wage increases which they are not getting today.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Under Medicare for all the hospitals will save substantial sums of money because they are not going to be spending a fortune doing billing and the other bureaucratic things that they have to do today.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Second of all--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Maybe you did that and made money off of healthcare but our job is to run a nonprofit health care system.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Furthermore--furthermore, when we save $500 billion a year by ending all of the incredible complexities that are driving--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --every American crazy, trying to deal with the health insurance company--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Hospitals will be better off than they are today.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: When I am president illegally crossing the border will still be a legal. We can argue over the finer points of which parts of this ought to be handled by civil law and which parts ought to be handled by criminal law but we've got a crisis on our hands and it's not just a crisis of immigration, it's a crisis of cruelty and incompetence that has created a humanitarian disaster on our southern border. It is the stain on the United States of America.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Americans want comprehensive immigration reform and frankly we have been talking about the same framework for my entire adult lifetime. Protections for dreamers, making sure that we have a pathway to citizenship for the undocumented, cleaning up lawful immigration. We know what to do. We know the border security can be part of that package and we can still be a nation of laws.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: The problem is we haven't had the will to get it done in Washington and now we have a president who could fix it in a month because there is that bipartisan agreement but he needs it to be a crisis rather than an achievement. That will end on my watch.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: So in my view if fraud is involved in that is suitable for the criminal statute. If not then it should be handled under civil law but the show of hands are exactly what is wrong with the way that this race is being--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: We appreciate that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: I do because in my administration after we have waived citizenship fees for green card holders, more than 9 million of our fellow Americans free dreamers many fear of deportation and stopped criminally prosecuting families and children for seeking asylum and refuge and for-profit detention in this country and assisted those countries in Central America so that no family ever has to make that 2000 mile journey then I expect that people who come here follow our laws and we reserve the right to criminally prosecute them if they do not.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: So, the problem is that right now the criminalization statute is what gives Donald Trump the ability to take children away from their parents it's what gives him the ability to lock up people at our borders. We need to continue to have border security and we can do that. But what we can't do is not live our values. I've been down to the border. I have seen the mothers. I have seen the pages of babies. We must be a country that everyday lives our values and that means we cannot make it a crime--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Yes--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: The point is not about criminalization that has given Donald Trump the tool to break families apart.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We need--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Well, I agree that we need to secure borders. There's no question about that and the--the frustration with what's going on in Washington is they are kicking the ball back and forth. Secure the borders. Make sure whatever law we have doesn't allow children to be snatched from their parents and put in cages. How hard can that be? We got I don't know on the two debate nights we got 170 years of Washington experience somehow that seems like it should be fairly fixable.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Well, and one way to fix it is to decriminalize. That's the whole point. What we're looking for here is a way to take away the tools that Donald Trump has--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --used to break up families.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: I would say there is the will to change this in congress. What's missing is the right person in the White House. I believe that immigrants don't diminish America. They are America. And if you want to do something about border security you first of all change the rules so that people can seek asylum in those Northern Triangle countries. Then you pass the bill and what the bill will do is it will greatly reduce the deficit and give us the money for border security and for border processing the cases. And most of all, it will allow for a path to citizenship. Because this is not just about the border. Donald Trump wants to use these people as political pawns.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: We have people all over our country that simply want to work and obey the law.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: We have a strong border protections. But the main point I want to make is that what Trump is doing through his racism and his xenophobia is demonizing a group of people. And as president I will end that demonization. If a mother and a child walk thousands of miles on a dangerous path in my view they are not criminals.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: They are people fleeing violence. And I think the main thing that we've got to do--among many others--Beto made this point--we got to ask ourselves, why are people walking 2000 miles to a strange country where they don't know the language? So what we will do the first week we are in the White House is bring the entire hemisphere together to talk about how we (INAUDIBLE) Honduras, Guatemala and El Salvador--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --so people do not have to flee their own countries.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: I think that what we have to do is we have to be an America that is clear about what we want to do with immigration. We need to expand legal immigration, we need to create a path for citizenship not just for dreamers. But for grandmas and for people who have been working here in the farms

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: for students who have overstayed their visas.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We need to fix the crisis at the border. And a big part of how we do that is we do not play into Donald Trump's hands.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --He wants to stir up the crisis at the border because that's his overall message. It's if there's anything wrong in your life--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Blame them.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Well, what you're saying is ignore the law. Laws matter and it matters if we say our law is that we will lock people up who come here seeking refuge, who come here--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Seeking asylum. That is not a crime. And as Americans, what we need to do is have a sane system that keeps us safe at the border, but does not criminalize the activity--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Of a mother--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Fleeing here for safety.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Well, I--two things. A sane immigration policy moves the comprehensive immigration reform. It (INAUDIBLE) to a humane border policy in which, by the way, we have enough administrative judges so that we don't have incredible backlogs that we have right now. But, to answer your question, I happen to believe that when I talk about healthcare as a human right that applies to all people in this country. And under a Medicare for All, single payer system, we could afford to do that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Well, this epidemic of gun violence has hit my community, too, far too many times. It's the worst part of being mayor, getting the phone call, consoling grieving parents. And we have a mass shootings worth of killings every day in this country. What we're doing hasn't worked because we haven't had a system in Washington capable of delivering what the American people have told us they want. Eighty--90 percent of republicans want universal background checks, not to mention the common sense solutions, like red flag laws that disarm domestic abusers and flag mental health risks and an end to assault weapons. Things like what I carried overseas in uniform that have no business in American neighborhoods in peace time, let alone anywhere near a school.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: I--I was at an event a few days ago and a 13 year old asked me what we were going to do about school safety and then began shaking and then began crying. And we could talk about these policies, but we already know the policies. The only thing I could think of, looking into the eyes of this child, is we're supposed to be dealing with this so you--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --don't have to. High school is hard enough without having to worry about whether you are going to get shot and when 90 percent of Americans want something to happen--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: And Washington can't deliver--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: We can't expect the same--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: I disagree with his diagnosis of the problem.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Well, this is the fundamental nonsense of government. Another thing--another place where despite our best efforts we can't seem to make any progress and when I went to the--to the movie theater in Aurora in 2012 and saw that footage of what happened, back crime scene I will never forget it and we decided you know that we were going to go out and take on the--the NRA and we passed as a purple state we passed universal background checks. We limited magazine capacity. We did the basic work that for whatever reason doesn't seem to be able to get done in Washington.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: This isn't just about a system or it's not just about words. This is a about the NRA. I have sat across from the president of the United States after Parkland because I have been a leader on these issues and have the bill to close the boyfriend loophole and I watched and wrote down when nine times he said he wanted universal background checks. The next day he goes and he meets with the NRA and he folds. As you are president I will not fold. I will make sure that we get universal background checks passed, the assault weapons ban, that we do something about magazines and that we understand when that six little--little six-year-old boy died, Stephen Romero, when his dad said he is only six years old all I can say is--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: All I can say is he is six years old.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: We have to remember that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: This is the exact same conversation we've been having since--since I was in high school. I was a junior when the Columbine shooting happened. I was part of the first generation that saw a routine school shootings. We have now produced the second school shooting generation in this country. We dare not allow there to be a third. Something is broken if it is even possible for the same to bait around the same solutions that we all know are the right thing to do. They won't prevent every incident, they won't save every life but we know what to do and it has not happened.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: Yes. What is broken is a political system that allows the NRA and other large big money to come in and make things not happen when the majority of people are for it. The people are with us now. After Parkland those students just didn't March, they talk to their dads and their grandpas and the hunters in their family and they said there must be a better way. Then we elected people in the house of representatives and guess what? It changed and they passed universal background checks and now that bill is sitting on Mitch McConnell's doorstep because of the money and the power of the NRA. As president I will take them on.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: This is not about systems and words.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: how else can we explain that we lose nearly 40,000 people in this country to gun violence? A number that no of their country comes even close to that we know what all of the solutions are and yet nothing has changed? It is because in this country money buys influence, access and increasingly outcomes. The Centers for Disease Control prevented from actually studying the issue in the first place. As president we will make sure that we ban political action committee contributions to any member of Congress or any candidate for federal office. We will listen to people, not packs, people not corporations, people not special interests.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: I think we have got to do--I think what I meant is what President Obama said in that nobody up here is going to tell you that we have a solution to the crisis. Now, I come from one of the most rural states in America. I have a D- voting record from the NRA, and as president, I suspect it will be an F record. What I believe we have got to do is have the guts to finally take on the NRA. You asked me about my record back in 1988 coming from a state that had no gun control. I called for the ban of the sale and distribution of assault weapons. I lost that election. I will do everything I can not only to take on the NRA, but to expand and create universal background checks, do away with the straw man provision, do away with the gun show loophole, and do away with the loopholes now exist for gun manufacturers who are selling large amounts of weapons into communities that are going to gangs.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Still the conversation that we've been having for the last 20 years. Of course we need to get money out of politics. But when I proposed the actual structural democratic reforms that might make a difference and the electoral college, amend the Constitution if necessary, to clear up Citizens United, have DC actually be a state and depoliticize the Supreme Court with structural reform, people look at me funny as if this country were incapable of structural reform. Does anybody really think we're going to overtake Citizens United without constitutional action? This is a country that once changed its Constitution so you couldn't drink and then changed it back because we changed our minds about that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: And you are telling me we can't reform our democracy--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --In our time?

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --We have to or will be having the same argument 20 years from now.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --So (INAUDIBLE)--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: I'd like to have a chance on this--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: I'd like to be part of this--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --I'd like to be heard on this--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: I'm saying that policies of this notion that you're going to take private insurance away from 180 million Americans who many of them don't want to give it--many of them do want to get rid of it but some don't. Many don't. Are you going to--the Green New Deal makes sure that every American is guaranteed a government job if they want. That is a disaster. You might as well FedEx the election to Donald Trump. I think we got to focus on where Donald Trump is failing. You know, the word malpractice this is interesting I always thought of this as doctors or lawyers it's you know, (INAUDIBLE) proper illegal professional activity for doctors, lawyers or public officials. Google it. Check it out. Donald Trump is malpractice personified. We got to point that out why is it soybean farmers in--in Iowa need 10 good years to get back to where they were two years ago? Where is the manufacturing jobs that are supposed to come back? Why are we lurching from one international crisis to another? All things that he promised American voters. We got to focus on that and the economy and jobs and training so that we can promise a future for America that everybody wants to invest in.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Well, the truth is that every credible poll that I have seen has me beating Donald Trump.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Including--including the battleground states of Michigan where I won the democratic primary, Wisconsin, where I won the democratic primary and Pennsylvania. And the reason we are going to defeat Trump and beat him badly he is a fraud and a phony and we are going to expose him for what he is.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: The American people want to have a minimum wage which is a living wage, $15 bucks an hour. I've helped lead that effort. The American people want to pay reasonable prices for prescription drugs not the highest prices--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --not the highest prices in the world--I've helped lead the effort for that as well.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: So again I--I think if you are going to force Americans to make these radical changes they are not going to go along--throw your hands up.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: (INAUDIBLE)

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Oh wow I can do it. But you don't have to implement the plans. Us governors and mayors are the ones that we have to pick up all the pieces when suddenly the government is supposed to take over all these responsibilities and there's no preparation--the details on what you can't just spring a plan on the world an expect it to succeed.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: John, I was a mayor and I transformed my city. I have some practical experience. Second of all, interestingly enough today is the anniversary of Medicare. 54 years ago under Linda Johnson and a democratic congress they started a new program after one year--19 million elderly people in it. Please don't tell me that in a four year period we cannot go from 65 down to 55 to 45 to 35. This is not radical. This is what virtually every other country on earth does.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: We are--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: Bernie was talking about the battleground states in which we compete. There is a new battleground state, Texas, and it has 38 electoral college votes.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: And the way that we put it in play was by going to each one of those 254 countries. No matter how red or rural we did not write you off. No matter how blue or urban we did not take you for granted and we didn't trim our sales either. We had the courage of our convictions talking about universal healthcare, comprehensive immigration reform and confronting the challenge of climate before it is too late. We brought everyone in--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: --and now we have a chance to beat Donald Trump with Texas.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: No. It is my way of talking about I know how to fight and I know how to win. I took on giant banks and I beat them. I took on Wall Street and CEOs and their lobbyists and their lawyers and I beat them. I took on a popular republican incumbent senator and I beat him. I remember when people said Barack Obama couldn't get elected. Shoot, I remember when people said Donald Trump couldn't get elected, but here's where we are. I get it. There is a lot at stake and people are scared. But, we can't choose a candidate we don't believe in just because we're too scared to do anything else. And we can't ask other people to vote for a candidate we don't believe in. Democrats win when we figure out what is right and we get out there and fight for it. I am not afraid. And for democrats to win, you can't be afraid either.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Well--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: You know, I don't understand why anybody goes to all the trouble of running for president of the United States just to talk about what we really can't do and shouldn't fight for.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: I don't get it.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Our biggest problem in Washington is corruption. It is giant corporations that have taken our government and that are holding it by the throat. And we need to have the courage to fight back against that. And until we're ready to do that

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: it's just more of the same. Well, I'm ready to get in this fight. I'm ready to win this fight.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --And--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: So, look, he--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --Well, he just mentioned my name--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Talks--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: He talks about solutions that are workable. We have tried the solution of Medicare, Medicaid, and private insurance. And what have the private insurance companies done? They've sucked billions of dollars out of our healthcare system. They've made everybody fill out dozens and dozens of forms. Why? Not because they're trying to track your healthcare. They just want one more excuse to say no. Insurance companies do not have a God-given right to suck money out of healthcare system.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: And 2020 is our chance to--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Stop that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Detroit was mentioned and I'm delighted that troi (PH)--Detroit is rebounding. But, let us understand, Detroit was nearly destroyed because of awful trade policy, which allowed--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --Corporations to throw workers in this community out on the streets as they moved to low wage countries. To win this election and to defeat Donald Trump, which, by the way, in my view it's not going to be easy. We need to have a campaign of energy and excitement and of vision. We need to bring millions of young people into the political process in a way that we have never seen by among other things making public--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --colleges and universities to wish in free and canceling student debt.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: Everyone wants to get elected but my point is this I think when we have a guy in the White House that has now told over 10,000 lies that we had better be very straightforward with the American people. And no, do I think that we are going to end up voting for a plan that kicks half of America off of their current insurance in four years? No, I don't think we are going to do that. I think there is a better way to get what we all want to see which is lower cost for healthcare. Do I think that we are going to vote to give free college to the wealthiest kids? No, I--I don't think we are going to do that. So that is what I am talking about but what I don't like about this argument right now--what I don't like about it at all is that we are more worried about winning an argument than winning an election and I think--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: -- how we win an election is to bring everyone with us and yes, I have one in a state every single time, statewide I have one those congressional districts that Donald Trump one by over 20 points. He just targeted Minnesota last week and I have done it by getting out there and talking to people, by knowing rural issues--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: --and farm issues and bringing Metro people with me in a state that have the--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: --highest voter turnout in the country.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: That is what we want.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: you know I think a big part of--of leadership in showing our commitment to the American people is delivering on our commitments. As a member of Congress when I learned that the El Paso VA had the worst wait times for mental health care in the country meaning that care delayed functionally became care tonight and was related to the suicide epidemic, we made it our priority and we turned around the VA in El Paso. We took that lesson nationally and I worked with Republican and Democratic colleagues to expand mental health care to veterans and we got it signed into law by the one person with whom I agree on almost nothing, Donald Trump, to show at the end of the day we will put the American people first--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: --before party, before any other concern.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: So climate crisis is the existential crisis for our world. It puts every living thing on this planet at risk. I have a plan for a green industrial policy that takes advantage of the fact that we do what we do best and that is innovate and create. So I have proposed putting $2 trillion in so we do the research. We then say anyone in the world can use it so long as you build it right here in America. That will produce about 1.2 million manufacturing jobs right here in Michigan, right here in Ohio, right here in the industrial Midwest.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: And the second thing we will do is we will then sell those products all around the world. Right now

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --For every one dollar the United States--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --Spends trying to market around the world--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --China is spending $100.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Well, I think the guarantee for public job for everyone who wants one is a classic part of the problem. It's a distraction. I share the urgency of everyone appear. We have to recognize, I mean, everyone's got good ideas. What we do in this country is no better than just a best practice, right? It's what we do here is a--is a best practice and a template, but it's got to be done all over the world.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: So we've got to be building bridges right now with people like China who were cheating on international agreements and stealing intellectual property. We need to work on that, but not with the tariff system. We need every country working together if we're going to really deal with climate change in a realistic way.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Well, I put a real policy on the table to create 1.2 million new jobs and in green manufacturing. There's going to be a $23 trillion worldwide market for this. This could revitalize huge cities across this country, and no one wants to talk about it. What you want to do instead is find the Republican talking point of a made-up piece of some other part and say oh, we don't really have to do anything. That's the problem we got in Washington right now.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: It continues to be--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: --A Washington that works great for oil companies, just not for people worried about climate change.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: I get a little bit tired of Democrats afraid of big ideas. Republicans are not a big of afraid of big ideas. They could give $1 trillion in tax breaks to billionaires and profitable corporations. They could bail out the crooks on Wall Street, so please don't tell me that we cannot take on the fossil fuel industry and nothing happens unless we do that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Here is the bottom line, we've got to ask ourselves a simple question. What do you do with an industry that knowingly for billions of dollars in short-term profits is destroying this planet? I say that is criminal activity that cannot be allowed to continue.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Look--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: On this issue, my friends, there is no choice. We have got to be super aggressive if we love our--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: children and if we want to leave them a planet that is healthy and is habitable. So, I might disagree with Tim. What that means is we got to A. take on the fossil fuel industry. B. it means we have to transform our energy system away from fossil fuel to energy efficiency and sustainable energy and a hell of a lot of good union jobs as we do that. We got to transform our transportation system.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: And we have to lead the world because of --

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --and American industry.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Look, Steve nobody in the congress is more strongly pro-worker than I am. So, when I talk about taking on the fossil fuel industry what I am also talking about is a just transition.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: We can create with the Green New Deal is about it's a bold idea. We can create millions of good paying jobs. We can build communities in rural America that have been devastated. So we are not antiworker. We are going to provide and make sure that those workers have a transition to new jobs (INAUDIBLE) healthcare and education.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: I've listened to scientists on this and they are very clear--we don't have more than 10 years to get this right. And we won't meet that challenge with half steps or half measures or only half the country. We got to bring everyone in. The people of Detroit and those that I listened to in Flint last week--they want the challenge. They want those jobs. They want to create the future for this country and the world. Those community college students I met in Tucumcari, New Mexico understand that wind and solar jobs are the fastest growing jobs in the country and those farmers in Iowa say pay me for the environmental services of planting cover crops and keeping more land in conservation easements. That's how we meet the challenge. We do it with everyone in this country. We bring everyone into the solution.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: We have all put out highly similar visions on climate. It is all theoretical. We will deal with climate if and only if we win the presidency. If and only if we beat Donald Trump.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: Nominate me and you get to see the President of the United States stand next to an American war veteran and explain why he chose to pretend to be disabled when it was his chance to serve. Nominate me and we will have a different conversation with American voters about why the President of the United States thinks you're a sucker. When the problem in your life is your paycheck is not going up nearly as fast as the cost of housing or the cost of education--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --or the cost of prescription drugs. He has done nothing about it except (INAUDIBLE).

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: Thank you, Dana and I was just in Flint. And they are still drinking bottled water in that town and that is outrageous. So my plan and I am the first one that came out with an infrastructure plan and I did that because this is a bread and butter issue. So bread and butter issue for people that are coming-

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: (INAUDIBLE) traffic jams. I think the governor here in Michigan smartly ran on the slogan fix the damn roads and it is an issue for union jobs and so I think what we need to do is not have a precedent that has promised he was going to do that on election night if anyone reads members and then he hasn't followed through. He has done nothing. He blew up the meeting at the White House. I would put $1 trillion into the sand I would pay for it by first of all changing the capital gains rate, by doing something when it comes to that regressive tax bill that left everyone behind but really made his Mar-a-Lago friends richer as he promised and I would take that money and put it into rural broadband and green infrastructure so you won't have what you just saw in Detroit with the Jefferson-Chalmers neighborhood, the African neighborhood that was African-American neighborhood that was most hit when you had those recent rainstorms. And I truly believe that if we are going to move on infrastructure--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: --and climate change you need a voice from the heartland.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: we will call his racism an amount for what it is and also talk about its consequences. It doesn't just offend our sensibilities to hear him say send her back about a member of Congress because she's a woman of color, because she's a Muslim American. Doesn't just offend our sensibilities when he calls Mexican immigrants rapist and criminals or seeks to ban all Muslims from the shores of a country that is comprised of people from the world over or from every tradition of faith. It is also changing this country. Hate crimes are on the rise every single one of the last three years.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: On the day that he signed his executive order attempting to ban Muslim travel the mosque in Victoria, Texas was burned to the ground. So we must not only stand up against Donald Trump and defeat him in this next election but we must also ensure that we don't just tolerate or respect our differences but we embrace them. That is what we have learned in El Paso, Texas, my hometown, one of the safest cities in the United States of America not despite but because it is a city of immigrants and asylum seekers and refugees. We will show that our--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: --adversity is our strength in my administration.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: Well the core value behind this entire country's history is working towards a more perfect union, that all people are created equal and we have fallen far away from that. I think the job is incumbent on any one of us to make the convincing case that we can deliver an urban agenda that represents progress in schools. You know Colorado when I was mayor we got to universal pre-K for every kid in the urban city. We did major police reform 10 years before Ferguson. Why is it now that five years after Ferguson we still don't have anything? How do we get affordable housing? We create a scholarship fund for every kid. You've got to deliver a vision like that for the whole country.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: What's--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Yes.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We need to call out white supremacy for what it is, domestic terrorism.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: And it poses a threat to the United States of America. We live in a country now where the precedent is advancing environmental racism, economic racism, criminal justice racism, healthcare racism. The way we do better is to fight--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: go back and show something better. So, I have a plan, for example, on education that says we have to build a better education system for all our kids, but we've got to acknowledge what's happened on race. So, my plan have universal tuition free college for all of our kids, but also increases the Pell Grant and levels the playing field by putting $50 billion into historically black colleges and universities.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: It cancels student loan debt for 95 percent of the kids with student loan debt and helps close the black-white wealth gap in America.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: As an urban mayor serving a diverse community, the racial divide lives within me. I'm not saying that I became mayor and racism or crime or poverty ended on my watch. But, in our city, we have come together repeatedly to tackle challenges like the fact that far too many people were not getting the help they needed in their housing and so, we directed it to a high--historically underinvested African American neighborhood. Right now, in the wake of a police-involved shooting, our community is moving from hurting to healing by making sure that the community can participate in things like revising the use of force policy and making sure there are community voices on the board of safety that handles police matters.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: I proposed a Douglas Plan to tackle this issue nationally because mayors have hit the limits of what you can do unless there is national action. Systemic racism has touched every part of American life, from housing to health, to home ownership. If you walk into an emergency room and you are black, your reports of pain will be taken less seriously. If you apply for a job and you are black, you are less likely to be called just because of the name on the resume. It's why I've proposed that we do everything from investing in historically red line neighborhoods--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --To build black wealth in home ownership--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Pete Buttigieg
body: --to supporting entrepreneurship for black Americans.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: Well, first of all, there are vo--people that voted for Donald Trump before that aren't racist. They just wanted a better shake in the economy. And so, I would appeal to them. But, I don't think anyone can justify what this president is doing. Little kids literally woke up this weekend, turned on the TV and saw their president calling their city, the town of Baltimore, nothing more than a home for rats. And I can tell you, as your president, that will stop. The second thing I would say is that economic opportunity means economic opportunity for everyone in this country. I know that because I have lived it. And that means when we put out there better childcare and better education and we pay teachers more and we make sure there's a decent retirement system in place. Yes, we help the African American community and we must because they have been the ones that have been most hurt by what we've seen in the last decade, but we help everyone.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: So, what I say to the people in my rural parts of my state, just like I say to them in the city and bring them together, is that economic opportunity must be there--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Amy Klobuchar
body: --For everyone--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: I want to acknowledge something that we're all touching on, which is the very foundation of this country, the--the wealth that we have built, the way we became the greatest country on the face of the planet was literally on the backs of those who were kidnapped and brought here by force.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: The legacy of slavery and segregation and Jim Crowe and suppression is alive and well in every aspect of the economy and in the country today. As president, I will sign into law a new voting rights act. I will focus on education, address healthcare disparities, but I will also sign into law Sheila Jackson Lee's reparations bill so that we can have

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: the national conversation we have waited too long in this country to have.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Well, I responded to that by saying that I am supportive of Jim Clyburn's legislation, which is called 10-20-30. And with what that understands is that as a result of slavery and segregation and the institutional racism we see now in healthcare, in education, in financial services, we are going to have to focus big time on rebuilding distressed communities in America, including African-American communities. In terms of education, I also have a plan. It's called the Thurgood Marshall plan and it would focus on ending the growth of segregated schools in America. It would triple funding for title I schools, it would make sure that teachers in this country earned at least $60,000 a year.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: For decades we have had a trade policy that has been written by giant, multinational corporations to help giant multinational corporations. They have no loyalty to America. They have no patriotism. If they can save a nickel by moving a job to Mexico they'll do it in a heartbeat. If they can continue a polluting plant by moving it to Vietnam they'll do it in a heartbeat. I have put out a new comprehensive plan that says, when are we going to do it that way? We are going to negotiate our deals with unions at the table, with small businesses at the table, with small farmers at the table, with environmentalists at the table. With human rights activists at the table. And then, we are going to use the fact that everybody in the world wants to get to America's markets. They want to sell to you.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: It's--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: If everyone wants to get to America's markets. No.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: So the question is--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: We need to raise our standards.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Oh, I'm sorry.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: What the congressman is describing as extreme is having deals that are negotiated by American workers for American workers. American workers want those jobs. And we can build the trade deals that do it. People want access to our markets all around the world. Then the answer is let's make them raise their standards. Make them pay their workers more. Let their workers unionize. Raise their environmental standards before they come to us and say they want to be able to sell their products. Right now, the whole--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: working for the big multinationals. It's just not working for the people here in the United States.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: and we can change that.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: You know the--the question was about tariffs and they are a huge mistake. They constitute the largest tax increase on the American consumer hitting the middle class and the working poor especially hard and farmers in Iowa and across the country are bearing the brunt of the consequences. When have we ever gone to war including a trade war without allies and friends and partners? As president we will hold China accountable or we will bring our allies and friends like the European Union to bear and we will also negotiate trade deals that favor farmers and American workers and protect human rights and the environment and labor, not just here in the United States--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Beto O'Rourke
body: but in those (INAUDIBLE).

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: I just want to respond to this.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Okay. You are looking I believe that the only member of Congress who not only voted against these disastrous trade agreements, NAFTA, PM. TR (PH) with China which cost us over 4 million jobs but also helped lead the effort against these agreements.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: Now Elizabeth is absolutely right, if anybody here thinks that corporate America gives one damn about the average American worker you are mistaken. If they can save five cents--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --by going to China, Mexico or Vietnam or anyplace else that is exactly what they would do. As president let me tell you what I will do. These guys line up at the federal trough. They want military contracts, they want all kinds of contracts. Well, under my administration you ain't going to get those contracts if you are throwing American workers--

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Bernie Sanders
body: --out on the street.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: John Hickenlooper
body: So I think again I think Congressman Delaney has got a point here and there is a way of looking at--at trade that is therapeutic. The bottom line is you talk to any economist, there is not a single example in history where a trade war had a winner. Trade wars are for losers and the bottom line is we have got to recognize let's negotiate a better trade deal but you are not going to win against China in a trade war when they've got 25% of our total debt. And step back and look at here Trump gives that giant tax cut and at the same time so we are paying in tariffs about $800-$1200 per household and then we give this incredible tax cut to the rich. Essentially what is happening is now he has transferred that tax obligation on to the middle class. That is what's outrageous but tariffs are not the solution.

title: CNN HOSTS 2020 DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL DEBATES IN DETROIT, NIGHT 1
name: Elizabeth Warren
body: Anyone who thinks that these trade deals are mostly about tariffs just doesn't understand what's going on. Look at the new NAFTA 2.0. What's the central feature? It is to help pharmaceutical companies get longer periods of exclusivity so they can charge Canadians, Americans and Mexicans more money and make more profits. That is what trade deals have become. They have become a way for giant multinationals to change the regulatory environment so they can suck more profits out for themselves and to leave the American people behind. We have to have the courage to fight back against that corruption.
